item.description:
Go back to your childhood and play a game of kickball! My friend is organizing a kickball game this Sunday in Boston. This is an adult game so no kids (we're not liable for any injuries). ^__^

If you don't know what kickball is, please come and see! All you do is just kick a ball and run the bases. We'd prefer guys (it's a lot of girls so far) but no preferences will be given. It's on a first come first kick basis. I hope you all can come and join us in our most embarrassing moment!

Joe Moakley Park

446 Old colony Ave

Boston, MA

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Kickball!
